tips: Use clear, descriptive names for list types (e.g., 'User Status' not 'Status')
Keep option values URL-safe (lowercase, no spaces, use hyphens/underscores)
Use the AI generation feature to quickly populate common list types
Set appropriate sort orders for options that have a natural sequence
